safariText: Safari does not currently support saving file names. We recommend opening this page with
saveText: Click this button to save your publication.
safariExplain: Safari does not currently support saving file names. Your export will be saved in your Downloads folder as a file with the name "Unknown". Please rename this file to "export.zip".
staticObsolete: Static publications are deprecated and will be replaced by database-driven live publications in future versions of HyperImage.
pubToolText: With the PubTool you can create a static HTML publication of your project. Please adjust the publication settings to your liking and select a theme. After clicking on "Create Publication" a HTML publication will be created and saved as a ZIP file on your computer.
lightPinkOrangeTheme: Light with Dark Pink and Orange
metadataText: Sort the object metadata via drap&drop. The item a the top will be displayed as the annotation, the second item as the title of the object.
groupText: Sort your groups via drag&drop to the desired menu display order. Use the checkbox to set the group visibility.
textText: Sort your project texts via drag&drop to the desired menu display order. Use the checkbox to set the text visibility.
litaText: Sort your light tables via drag&drop to the desired menu display order. Use the checkbox to set the light table visibility.
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. You have been logged out because of inactivity.
endpointMissing: The required parameter "session" is missing. Pleas start the Publication Tool via the HyperImage Editor.
